items.title: The Pentagon says it has offered compromises to Anthropic, including putting in writing that laws already bar the military from mass surveillance of Americans (Jennifer Jacobs/CBS News)
items.title_en: The Pentagon says it has offered compromises to Anthropic, including putting in writing that laws already bar the military from mass surveillance of Americans (Jennifer Jacobs/CBS News)
items.title_zh: 五角大楼表示，它已向 Anthropic 提出妥协，包括以书面形式规定法律已经禁止军队对美国人进行大规模监视（Jennifer Jacobs/CBS 新闻）

items.title:
Anthropic围绕与美国国防部的磋商情况发布声明：本公司无法接受国防部（获取无限权限）的要求。

希望国防部能够三思。
